overview: Altea, a young director, has lost her parents, both drug addicts. Many are their friends who died because of heroin but some remain, historical memory of a dissolved generation. These include Lindiota, named after it because it moved to Lindos on the island of Rhodes. There, Altea joins him to collect useful material for the film he is writing with the idea of reworking mourning through artistic creation.
title: Lindiota
